channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kennedy Center Board Moves to Rename It the Trump-Kennedy Center
item.description: The performing arts center is by law designated the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and it has been generally understood that the powe...

item.title: Mangione pre-trial hearing wraps, but judge won't rule on evidence for months
item.description: After three weeks of testimony, a judge will now rule on whether evidence found in Mangione's backpack can be used in his state trial for the murder o...

item.title: What to know about Jared Isaacman, the billionaire private astronaut leading NASA
item.description: Trump withdrew Isaacman's nomination in May, citing the billionaire's donations to Democrats and ties to Elon Musk. He was renominated last month and ...

item.title: Austrian nuns await word from the Vatican on whether they can stay in their convent
item.description: The three octogenarian nuns broke out of a nursing home to go back to live in their convent, sparking a dispute with their church superior. Both sides...

item.title: After Rob Reiner’s ‘North’ Flopped, He Proved He Could Take Criticism With Humor
item.description: Roger Ebert said he “hated, hated, hated, hated, hated” Reiner’s 1994 film “North.” The director took it in stride.

item.title: From Bravo to Cable News, Garcia Is Pushing Republicans on Epstein
item.description: The top Democrat on the Oversight Committee, Representative Robert Garcia has brought aggressive tactics and reality-show flair to investigating Trump...

item.title: New York has a new Archbishop. His background looks a lot like Pope Leo's
item.description: Like Pope Leo, Bishop Ronald Hicks is an Illinois native with deep experience in Latin America.

item.title: Justin Trudeau and Katy Perry Are Worth Rooting For
item.description: As a politician, Justin Trudeau was an excellent celebrity. And the rest of the world could learn a useful lesson from how he wielded his star power.

item.title: Inflation cools slightly in November as worries about affordability grip Americans
item.description: The cost of living in November was up 2.7% from a year ago, according to a report Thursday from the Labor Department. That's a smaller annual increase...

item.title: Palo Alto Confronts Billionaires Over Their Housing Compounds
item.description: The Silicon Valley college town has changed drastically as Mark Zuckerberg, Larry Page and other tech founders have scooped up multiple properties.

item.title: Australia to Crack Down on Hate Speech After Bondi Beach Attack
item.description: New legislation will be drafted to target those who promote violence and to increase penalties for hate speech, the prime minister said Thursday.

item.title: French Doctor Sentenced to Life for Fatally Poisoning 12 People
item.description: Frédéric Péchier, an anesthesiologist, was found guilty of poisoning 30 patients, of whom 12 died.

item.title: The German Chancellor Betting on America
item.description: Friedrich Merz believes the world needs a stronger Germany. He is still navigating how to do it.

item.title: Christian Turner Is Appointed New UK Ambassador to US
item.description: Christian Turner’s appointment comes as the United States and Britain’s relationship is being tested amid a number of foreign policy issues.

item.title: Australian Police Detain 7 on Suspicion of Planning a ‘Violent Act’
item.description: The raid in Sydney occurred days after a mass shooting in Bondi Beach killed 15 people, but the police say they have found no connection between the t...
